event_data.continuation_prompt:
Mission: StageOrchestrator API Compatibility - Cycle 2 Refinements
=========================================================

PREVIOUS CYCLE ACCOMPLISHMENTS:
Cycle 1 achieved 100% backward API compatibility by adding:
- set_mission(), reset_mission(), load_mission() methods
- mission getter/setter, mission_dir property
- RDMissionController alias for import compatibility

OUTSTANDING ISSUES:
1. MINOR: Empty JSON file edge case - atomic_read_json returns {} instead of defaults

CYCLE 2 OBJECTIVES:

1. FIX EMPTY JSON EDGE CASE (if desired):
   - Modify StateManager.load_mission() to merge defaults when loading empty objects
   - Ensure mission_id always has a valid value

2. COMPREHENSIVE END-TO-END VALIDATION:
   - Run an actual mission through atlasforge_conductor.py with USE_MODULAR_ENGINE=true
   - Verify all stage transitions work correctly
   - Check WebSocket events emit properly
   - Validate mission state persistence across stages

3. ADDITIONAL ROBUSTNESS TESTING:
   - Test cycle iteration (multi-cycle mission)
   - Test recovery after crash/restart
   - Verify analytics integration working correctly

4. DOCUMENTATION:
   - Update any internal docs about the modular engine
   - Document the API compatibility layer

SUCCESS CRITERIA:
- No AttributeError or property errors in full mission run
- Stage transitions work identically to legacy controller
- WebSocket events emit for dashboard visibility
- All edge cases handled gracefully

FILES TO EXAMINE:
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/orchestrator.py (may need refinements)
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/state_manager.py (empty JSON fix)
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/atlasforge_conductor.py (reference for validation)

PRIORITY: MEDIUM (core functionality complete, refinements for robustness)

cycle_report.summary: Successfully implemented 100% backward API compatibility for StageOrchestrator with the legacy RDMissionController. Added missing methods (set_mission, reset_mission, load_mission), properties (mission getter/setter, mission_dir), and fixed process_response to handle None gracefully. All 16 self-tests pass and 13/14 adversarial tests pass.
achievements: Added set_mission() method to StageOrchestrator with full legacy signature (problem_statement, preferences, success_criteria, mission_id, cycle_budget, project_name)
Added reset_mission() method to reset mission state while preserving problem statement
Added load_mission() method that returns Dict for backward compatibility
Added mission_dir property to both StateManager and StageOrchestrator
Added mission property setter to StateManager and StageOrchestrator
Fixed process_response() to handle None responses gracefully
Added RDMissionController alias at module level for import compatibility
Integrated with analytics, token watcher, and AtlasForge enhancer in set_mission()
All 16 self-tests passed verifying conductor usage patterns work
issues: MINOR: Empty JSON file ({}) doesn't auto-populate with default mission_id - non-critical edge case that doesn't occur in normal operation
